body_html:
To clarify: it works on CPU but not on GPU, right? Unfortunately, while we always perform the checks on GPU, we never report those errors back to the user:

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/gather_op_gpu.cu.cc

Line 40 in c5f94b1

// TODO(fpmc): Log an error for transfer back to host.

It would be great to fix this, but we didn't know how to do it in a performant fashion.
body_text:
To clarify: it works on CPU but not on GPU, right?  Unfortunately, while we always perform the checks on GPU, we never report those errors back to the user:

  
    
      tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/gather_op_gpu.cu.cc
    
    
         Line 40
      in
      c5f94b1
    
    
    
    

        
          
           // TODO(fpmc): Log an error for transfer back to host. 
        
    
  


It would be great to fix this, but we didn't know how to do it in a performant fashion.
body:
To clarify: it works on CPU but not on GPU, right?  Unfortunately, while we always perform the checks on GPU, we never report those errors back to the user:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/c5f94b10bbb30e525fa3ca313e7ccb173040c90a/tensorflow/core/kernels/gather_op_gpu.cu.cc#L40

It would be great to fix this, but we didn't know how to do it in a performant fashion.
